definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]

sentences.english: The artistic achievements of Xiuruji mostly embody two aspects.
sentences.chinese: 《绣襦记》的艺术成就主要体现在两方面。

sentences.english: She said that memorizing the words of English songs helped a little.
sentences.chinese: 她说记风行歌曲歌词也有点帮忙。

sentences.english: Ganymede tried to recollect that it was a man's duty to comfort and console a woman, the weaker vessel.
sentences.chinese: 盖尼末德又拼命记起男人有责任安慰劝解女人。

sentences.english: Today, a move of the child, the simple mind, most of the food to eat.
sentences.chinese: 今天学了一招儿，简单记一下，最该吃的食物。

sentences.english: So I to lots of grammar in every class .
sentences.chinese: 于是我决定每堂课都记大量的语法笔记。

sentences.english: He wanted to do a time recording equipment, a good make up for lack of a sundial.
sentences.chinese: 他就想再做一件记时器具，好弥补日晷的不足。

sentences.english: If I can't think of an English word, I use a word or phrase that means the same thing.
sentences.chinese: 记生字时，在脑中想象一个这个字可以被运用的情境。

sentences.english: Just a second, Do you remember when you got your last vaccination?
sentences.chinese: 等一下。你记不记得最后一次做预防注射是什么时候？

sentences.english: You may chalk it on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用粉笔把它记在墙上。

sentences.english: I will forget, until they no longer remember the past things.
sentences.chinese: 礻翴我会忘记，直到自己不再记起那些过去的事。

sentences.english: How can we set up an account with you?
sentences.chinese: 若何才能跟你们设立记帐户头呢？

sentences.english: The instant I arrived home, I wrote down everything I had seen.
sentences.chinese: 一到家，我就把所见到的一切都记了下来。

sentences.english: The sons of Gerson also were numbered by the kindreds and houses of their fathers.
sentences.chinese: 革尔雄的子孙，依照宗族和家系登了记。

sentences.english: At the police station, everything he said was taken down.
sentences.chinese: 在警察局，他说的每句话都被记了下来。

sentences.english: God replied, Your angel's name is not hard to remember.
sentences.chinese: 上帝答道，“你的天使的名字并不难记。

sentences.english: I can’t remember all of them now, except for one.
sentences.chinese: 除了一个故事，其他的我现在都记不大清了。

definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
to record/record (written account)/note-taker/record (in sports etc)/CL:個|个[ge4]
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
to hit/to strike/to tap/to rap/to knock/to rip sb off/to overcharge
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals
clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
handleless cup/goblet/to concentrate/variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
